content: चाटुः, --टु {%<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} [चट्-उण्] Pleasing or agreeable words, sweet or coaxing speech, flattery (especially of a lover to his sweet-heart); प्रियः प्रियायाः प्रकरोति चाटुं <ls>Rs. 6. 14</ls>; विरचितचाटुवचनरचनं चरणरचितप्रणिपातं <ls>Gīt. 11</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 83</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 175</ls>; <ls>Śānti. 3. 14</ls>; <ls>Ch. P. 20</ls>; (the greater part of the 10th canto of गीतगोविंद consists of such coaxing). {@--2@} Distinct or clear speech. {@--3@} Endearing words or acts; <ls>Māl. 10. 1.</ls>

P. 20</ls>; (the greater part of the 10th canto of गीतगोविंद consists of such coaxing). {@--2@} Distinct or clear speech. {@--3@} Endearing words or acts; <ls>Māl. 10. 1.</ls>
